name: A Family Tree
description:
Explore your memories through photos in this short narrative game !

(Trigger warning : Dad Death)

  • Play with numpad mouse and space bar

Made by me in approximately 12 hours and half for Trijam#103 : A Family Tree

  • 2 hours for Game design and Ideas
  • At least 3 hours and half struggling with Gdevelop (this is my second game with it)
  • 7 hours to actually code the game, and create the different design
